name: ProtectYourAssetsMarketBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
David Hollander, "The Sandman", helps his listeners sleep well at night because they know their assets are protected. Protect Your Assets Market Briefing is hosted by David Hollander, Founder of Liberty Group. Twice weekly, you’ll get market reports, highlights, or clips from David’s radio show and full weekly podcast, Protect Your Assets. 

How to listen: 
Enable this skill then say "Alexa, Flash Briefing."
Listen to the PYA Market Briefing as an Alexa Flash Briefing or anywhere you get your podcasts.
Learn more: https://libertygroupllc.com/pyabriefing/

About your host:
As an investment advisor, David is on a mission to reduce investors’ financial fears by helping to address their biggest challenges and future goals. We’ll cover topics like smart money moves, how policy affects your investments, generating income in retirement, handling inflation, volatility, and more.

Protect Your Assets is a podcast and Saturday morning radio show running for over ten years on KNBR in the Bay Area.

Liberty Group helps individuals and families achieve their ideal retirements.
Book a free 15-minute consultation with an investment advisor: https://calendly.com/libertygroupllc/scheduleacall-voice/

Follow on social for market and investing updates:
Instagram: @pyaradio
Twitter: @pyaradio

Disclosure:
The following program is paid for by Liberty Group, and the views and opinions of the host do not represent those of this station or its ownership. Investment advisory services are offered through Liberty Wealth Management, an SEC-registered investment adviser. Legal information provided on the air is not intended to be a substitute for callers hiring their own lawyers to advise them about personal legal matters. The information provided is general financial comment and cannot be relied upon for your specific financial situation. Investing involves risks, including the risk of loss of your investment. Please consult with a financial professional before investing.
California Life Agent
Number 0B48569
